level.text: 1 The Board may grant continuing education credit for whole hours only,ith minimum of fifty (50) minutes constituting one (1) credit hour.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 955, 958 (February 12, 1988); asmended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8072 (August 17,007).
